ComicInfo.Penciller: Jason Johnson,Ryan Benjamin,Travis Charest,Jason Johnson,Ryan Benjamin,Travis Charest
ComicInfo.Summary: Maul learns more about his heritage and where his kind fits into the hierarchy of Khera. "Earthside!" Story by Alan Moore. Art by Jason Johnson and Tom McWeeney. Meanwhile back on Earth, has Savant and her new team gone too far? Have they crossed a line when they crash a villain's funeral in order to take down more bad guys? Includes a pinup of Voodoo by Travis Charest and Troy Hubbs. Voodoo explains to Warblade about the war between Kherubims and Daemonites and how it has been over for nearly 200 years. Meanwhile, Maul greets other beings just like him, known as Titans, and challenges one to a duel and wins. He doesn't realize the battle was for the right to have the challenger's sister, Glingo. When he arrives at his accommodations, he sees Voodoo, Warblade and Void looking particularly sad over the events of the planet. Meanwhile on Earth, Savant's team infiltrates H.A.R.M.'s funeral ceremony being held in a church reserved for cyborgs.
ComicInfo.Title: Catacombs
